name: Dwarf Deep
description:
Word has reached the Deep Down Dwarves of large amounts of gold deep beneath the waves. They put their best artisans on the task and they built you a boat (their first ever!) and sent you out to sample and see just how rich this veins are. 

Explore and dig deep beneath the waves to find resources to upgrade your gear.

Other platforms coming soon - compo deadline meant I didn't have time to properly test anything but win64, sorry!

How to Play:

Go to the forge on the boat to upgrade your gear. Doing so will take resources that you can either find floating in the ocean or deep underground.

Controls:

WASD - Move/Jump/Swim

LMB - Dig
